Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK ±kaùï ... 948
^fjk fjku f.dkq lr .; yels mßÈ iEu fldgilg u wh;a tla tla  NdIdjlg fjk fjk msgq wxl fhdod we;'&
947 - B 80847 — 300 (2014/06)

i;sm;d ksl=;a jk .eiÜ m;%fhys m<lsÍu  i|yd Ndr.kq ,nk ±kaùï ms<sn|
jeo.;a ksfõokhhs
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha wjika msgqfõ iEu udihl u uq,a i;sfha § m< lrk ksfõok Ndr.kakd
Èkhka iy fõ,djka ms<sn|j ñka wjOdkh fhduq lrkq ,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m< lsÍu i|yd oekaùï Ndr.ekSu .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkhg i;s follg fmr isl=rdod Èkfhys oyj,a 12'00 g
wjika lrkq ,efí' ;k;=re - wenE¾;=" úNd." fgkav¾ iy fjkafoais ms<sn| oekaùïj, wjika Èk iy fõ,djka ta ms<sn|j Wkkaÿjla olajk
whg m%udKj;a ld, fõ,djla ,efnk mßÈ fhdod.; hq;= njg" ish¨ u fomd¾;fïka;=" ixia:d iy uKav, hkdÈh j.n,d.; hq;= nj ñka
wjOdrKh flf¾' m<lsÍu i|yd tjkq ,nk iEu oekaùula u ;ks me;af;a muKla meyeÈ,sj msgm;a l< hq;= h' ksrjoH;djh ms<sn|j lrk
úuiSï iy meñKs,s 
.eiÜ m;%h m< jQ Èk isg f;uilg miqj Ndr.kq fkd,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m< lrk iEu oekaùula u .eiÜ m;%h m< lrkq ,nk Èkg i;s follg fmr tkï" 2014 cQ,s ui 04 jeks Èk m<
lrk .eiÜ m;%fha  oekaùï 2014 cqkss ui 20 jeks Èk oyj,a 12'00g fyda Bg fmr ;emEf,ka fyda f.kú;a rcfha uqøKd,hg NdrÈh hq;= h'
 2006 wxl 19 ork bf,lafg%dksl .Kqfokq mk; - 9 jeks j.ka;sh
zzhï m%ldYkhla" Í;shla" ksfhda.hla" kshuhla" w;=re jHjia:djla" ksfõokhla fyda fjk;a lsisjla .eiÜ m;%fha m< l< hq;= njg hï
mk;lska fyda kS;s m%{ma;shlska úêúOdk i,iajd we;s wjia:djl" ta Í;sh" ksfhda.h" kshuh" w;=re jHjia:dj" ksfõokh fyda fjk;a foh
bf,lafg%dksl iajrEmfha jk .eiÜ m;%hl m< lrkq ,enqjfyd;a ta úêúOdkh iïmQ¾K lr we;a;dla fia ie<lsh hq;= h'˜
mS' tÉ' t,a' ù' o is,ajd"
rcfha uqøKd,hdêm;s ^je' n'&'
2014 ckjdß ui 01 jeks Èk"

ie' hq'- 2014'06'06 osk m< jQ wxl 1"866 ork .eiÜ m;%fha  I : III  iy IV ^w& fldgia m< fkdù h'

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2014'06'13948
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK oekaùï
osid$ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh - j,mfka
1894 wxl 12 ork fkdjákd f,aLk úkdY lsÍfï wd{d mkf;a 05 jeks j.ka;sh m%ldrj lrkq ,nk ksfõokh hs'
02' fuu wêlrKh bÈßfha wjika ù we;s jir 05lg jvd merKs my; Wmf,aLkfha olajd we;s kvq jd¾;d 1894 wxl 12 ork
fkdjákd f,aLk úkdY lsÍfï wd{d mkf;a 05 jeks j.ka;sfha úê úOdk m%ldrj fuu oekaùu m%isoaO lrk ,o Èk isg udi 03la bl=;a
ùfuka miqj úkdY lrk nj okajd isáñ'
03' Wmf,aLkfha olajd we;s kvq jd¾;dj, msgm;a fyda fjk;a Bg wod, f,aLk ,nd .ekSug Wkkaÿjla olajk ;eke;a;ka úiska
fuu oekaùu m%isoaO lrk ,o Èk isg udi 03la bl=;a ùug fmr ta i|yd b,a¨ï l< hq;= njg o" lsishï kvq jd¾;djla úkdY fkdl< hq;=
njg Wkkaÿjla olajk ;eke;af;l= isà kï" fuu oekaùu m%isoaO lrk Èk isg udi 03la bl=;a ùug fmr ;ud úiska u fyda kS;s{jrfhl=
u.ska h:d mßÈ bÈßm;a lrkq ,nk fm;aiula u.ska idOdrK fya;= bÈßm;a lsÍug l%shd l<hq;= njg o fuhska ksfõokh lrkq ,efí'
04' ;j o" Wmf,aLkfha olajd we;s kvq jd¾;dj,g wod,j lsishï ;ekam;= uqo,la fõ kï tu uqo,a 2014 wf.daia;= 31 jeks Èkg fmr
wdmiq ,nd .ekSug lghq;= l< hq;= h' tfia fkdjqjfyd;a oekgu;a tu ;ekam;= kvqj wjika ù jir follg jvd jeä neúka uqo,a
fr.=,dis 570 mßÈ l,a bl=;a jQ ;ekam;= f,i i,ld tu ;ekam;a uqo,a uq' fr' 571^2& mßÈ wdodhug ner lsÍug l%shd lrk nj fuhska
ksfõokh lrkq ,efí'
tï' tÉ' *Ílaãka"

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2014'06'13 955
úúO oekaùï
i;afu;ais;ayjq, iñ;sh ixia:d.; lsÍu i|yd jQ mk;ls
cdkl jlal=Uqr jk uu" Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha md¾,sfïka;=fõ ia:djr ksfhda. wxl 48 ^1& hgf;a —i;afu;ais;a yjq,
iñ;sh ixia:d.;  lsÍu i|yd jQ mk;ls˜ hkqfjka ye¢kafjk mk;a flgqïm;la md¾,sfïka;=fõ § bÈßm;a lsÍug woyia lrk nj fuhska
oekqï foñ'
mk;a flgqïmf;a wruqK jkqfha my; i|yka fmdÿ mrud¾:j,ska hqla; jkakd jQ tlS i;afu;ais;ayjq, iñ;sh ixia:d.; lsÍuhs'
ksíndk.dó mámodj wjOdrKh lr .ksñka tu mrud¾:h bgqlr .ekSu Wfoid-
1' Wmdil Wmdisldjkag" meúÈ ù uyK oï msÍug iy wê YS, iudodkh" wê iudê iudodkh" wê m%{d iudodkh i|yd
wkqn, §u iy Bg myiqlï ie,iSu"
2' .sys Wmdil Wmdisldjkag iS," iudê" m%{d j¾Okh lr .ekSu i|yd wkqn, §u yd Bg myiqlï ie,iSu"
3' nqoaO foaYkdjg wkql+,j" fuu iñ;sh hgf;a msysgqjd we;s fiakdik moaO;shg wkuH jQ iy wdfõksl jQ Ndjkd
l¾uia:dk wNHdi mámdáhg wkql+,j Ndjkdj m%.=K lsÍug fuu fiakdik moaO;shg iïnkaê; isõjkla msßig
myiqlï ie,iSu"
hkdÈh fõ'
cdkl jlal=Uqr"
md¾,sfïka;= uka;%S'
06-258
Y%S ,xld rcfha uqøK fomd¾;fïka;=fõ uqøKh lrk ,§'
